name: places/ChIJMyEIcBdbwokRE6GjVgrSuh4
formattedAddress: 7 Harrison St, New York, NY 10013, USA
adrFormatAddress: 7 Harrison St, New York, NY 10013, USA

originalText.text:
Where do I start? I worked with Sam D at this store - when I’ve typically been a guy to work with a different clothier that I’ve sort of grown out of. Man, he couldn’t have been more accommodating. You feel welcome upon entrance, the space is roomy and great and he really wants to style you out in the right way. Not in what he thinks is cool, but what works for your body type and structure. He’s got a new customer in me, and you should check him out.  Jackets arrived in time, not a day earlier or later than advertised, and considering they were made to my specs, I’m blown away.

Confirmed purchase of three Jackets, will be back for suits when I have more time and don’t pull my traditional last minute gigs. He still hooked it up when no one else would.

Oh and - I called probably 6 different stores/suppliers. I didn’t get through to any. But it was Sam and Sam alone that cold called back. And went after my business. I respect that. Check them out.

originalText.text: Sam D. is absolutely the best sales/client service person I have ever worked with in high end custom suits. Runs the store with an owner's mind set. Very detail oriented, very generous with his time, stayed late to get things done on my multiple visits. great person to talk to as well. Kept his promise and delivered beyond expectations. Thank you Sam!!!

text.text: Sam D. is absolutely the best sales/client service person I have ever worked with in high end custom suits. Runs the store with an owner's mind set. Very detail oriented, very generous with his time, stayed late to get things done on my multiple visits. great person to talk to as well. Kept his promise and delivered beyond expectations. Thank you Sam!!!

originalText.text: We get custom suits regularly and we decided to try this place as we live not far from the store in NYC. After 3 different fittings and over a year of waiting for the shirt, the shirts still didn’t fit and they agreed that their patterns don’t fit us. It took OVER A YEAR!  Do Yourself a favor and DO NOT go to This place. There are plenty other places that are far better. You’ll be waiting forever for your clothes and it’s NOT even custom! They are following generic patents and pretend like it’s custom. Also! their customer service is horrendous. Go anywhere else but this place!

originalText.text: Alton Lane is a great goto for my work clothes. The scene is comfortable and relaxed and Sam is great on helping pick out the proper fabrics for the clothes.

text.text: Alton Lane is a great goto for my work clothes. The scene is comfortable and relaxed and Sam is great on helping pick out the proper fabrics for the clothes.

originalText.text:
I had an incredible experience working with Sam D. at Alton Lane. From the start, he was attentive, knowledgeable, and professional. Sam took the time to get to know me and understand my style preferences, ultimately leading to a suit that fit me perfectly and looked great.

Sam's attention to detail and commitment to quality were evident throughout the process.

Overall, I couldn't be happier with the exceptional service I received from Sam and the team at Alton Lane. I highly recommend them to anyone looking for a top-notch custom suit experience. Thanks, Sam!
